name: TIM&MIT
description:
TIM&MIT are two special robots.
UNITE they share the same 16 Kb of T-RAM
T-RAM: Timeless RAM, quantum static
continuum synchronized memory (TM)

TIM&MIT travel back and forward in TIME!
TIM record the work ahead, and then
MIT sync back with TIM!

They are fixing some trouble in a
photon-color computer

------------------------------------------------

[LEFT/RIGHT] arrows move robots

[UP] or [Z]  jump

[X] switch memory to other robots

[DOWN]  or [A] activate levers

[S] enter menu/pause game

[F11] go full screen

[ESC] show TIC menu

------------------------------------------------

My entry for FC_JAM, fantasy console jam.

Develop in 1 week with this wonderful fantasy computer TIC80

My first solo Jam, so no sound and poor art. Please vote and give me some feedback.
